Based on data from the Federal Reserve's Survey of Consumer Finances (2019), which is the most recent available, here are some general guidelines on retirement savings percentiles in the United States:

* Median retirement savings for all families: $60,000 - $70,000 (depending on age)
* Top 10% of retirement savers: around $750,000 - $1,000,000 or more in retirement accounts (ages 40-49)
* Top 5% of retirement savers: around $1,200,000 - $1,500,000 or more in retirement accounts (ages 40-49)

Considering you're 42 years old and have $1.5 million USD in assets, I would estimate that you're likely within the top 2-3% of retirement savers in your age group.
